Welcome to approxposterior’s documentation!¶

This is an informative sentence. Math:

In [1]: import numpy as np

In [2]: x = np.arange(10)

In [3]: x**2
Out[3]: array([ 0,  1,  4,  9, 16, 25, 36, 49, 64, 81])

In [4]: import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

In [5]: plt.plot([1,2,3]);
